Token.Abstract: An axis layout is used to calcualte the default data transform for an axis. It is provided with the enclosing range (min, max) of all series in the axis (assuming that all series use the same units).
Calculate layout transform for the axis

Parameter.Name: dataRange
Parameter.Abstract: Data range for all series associated with the axis

Parameter.Name: screenLength
Parameter.Abstract: Length of the axis, in screen co-ordinates

Parameter.Name: renderTransform
Parameter.Abstract: Current offset transform (i.e. transform caused by panning and zooming).
